questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source A. What can you tell from this source about the tension in Xinjiang? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source B. Which side do you think the cartoonist supports, the Chinese authorities or the Uighurs? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source C. Are you surprised by what the Uighur girl said? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source D. Why was this source published? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Sources E and F. Having read Source E, do you think the Chinese authorities would have approved of the publication of Source F Explain your answer.
